Package doa.engine.core

Class DoaWindowSettings

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.core.DoaWindowSettings
public final class DoaWindowSettings
extends java.lang.Object
An object of this class is supplied as an argument to DoaGame.initialize(DoaEngineSettings, DoaWindowSettings, String...). Applications can modify the contents of that object to customize the behavior of DoaWindow.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
